entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is described as having a 'clawed, wooden foot' and his appearance is mentioned as 'strange and frightening'. He is also said to have a 'long mane of grizzled gray hair' and a 'twisted and scarred face'.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as looking excited when he returns the books to his bag.

relationships.description: Moody interacts with Ron by telling him to put away the books and then calling out names during a register check.
